dialogs.text: This is Charon Station - a government space station with classified purpose. It stopped responding a few weeks ago.
I am John Dexter, an investigative reporter from the Proxima Centauri system. My daughter works at Charon station.
I decided to smuggle on an automatic supply shuttle to find out what happened.
As I exit the shuttle I notice the alarm lights flashing all over the docking bay.
The station is in lock down. I have to find a way to open the doors.
There is blood on the walls. There are even some dead bodies.
Was this a good idea? It's too late to go back now. I have to find Elena or at least what happened here.
